New Records: Shohei Ohtani stole his 56th base of the season.
Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani singled in the go-ahead run in the sixth inning.
Shohei Ohtani doubled to right in the fourth inning, allowing Gavin Lux to score.
Fernando Tatis Jr. homered to left center in the fifth inning.
Alex Vesia secured the win with 1.0 IP, 0 H, 0 ER, 0 K, 2 BB.
Michael Kopech earned the save with 1.0 IP, 0 H, 0 ER, 1 K, 1 BB.
Post-Match Reflections: The Los Angeles Dodgers are now within a victory of clinching the NL West.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was held at Dodger Stadium with an attendance of 52,310.
The game lasted 2 hours and 47 minutes.
